home.welcomeText: Vibe Coding: Building Site and Apps using Low-Code AI App Builders
home.description: A hands-on workshop to help you quickly build and deploy AI-powered applications without extensive coding.

promptExamples.label: Product Manager Prompt
promptExamples.content:
You are a highly experienced Prompt Engineer. Please improve my prompt below.

Prompt:
Role: You are a highly experienced Product Manager.
Goal: Create a simple and functional site or web app.  
Task: Using the description below, create a set of requirements my coding assistant can use to create this web app. Keep the app as simple as possible while still achieving our goal. 

Description: 
[A short description of the site including functionality, fields, and any other requirements]

promptExamples.label: Software Developer Prompt
promptExamples.content:
You are a highly experienced Prompt Engineer. Please improve my prompt below.

Prompt:
Role: You are a highly experienced Software Developer
Goal: Create a simple and functional site or web app.
Task: Create a web app that meets the requirements below.  Keep the app as simple as possible while still achieving our goal. 

Requirements:
[Paste requirements here]

instructionsPage.title: Instructions
instructions: Get setup
a) Go to www.replit.com
b) Create a free account.
c) Open your favorite LLM (ChatGPT, Claud, Gemini, etc.).
d) Open a blank google doc or word doc
Instructions
1) Decide on an site or app idea.
2) Create requirements doc
a) On your blank doc, write a short, 2-4 sentence summary of your site or app.
b) On the “Prompt Examples” page, copy the “Product Manager Prompt” and paste it in you blank doc.
c) Fill in the missing information in the brackets [].
d) Enter this prompt into your chatbot.
e) Copy the result and paste it into you blank doc.
f) Review it and make any changes you want.
g) Copy this new prompt into your chatbot to create your requirements.
h) Copy the resulting requirements list and past it into you blank doc.
3) Create a development plan.
a) Go to the “Prompt Examples” page, copy the “Software Developer Prompt” and paste it in your blank doc.
b) Repeat the same steps in step 2, but this time fill in the requirements you just created.
c) Enter this final result into your black doc.
4) Create your site or app using Replit.
a) Open Repit, paste your final prompt in the chat window, and click “Start Building”.
b) Approve the plan and wait for it to build your site or app. (1-5 minutes)
c) Once complete, test your app in the preview page.
5) Troubleshoot
a) If you recieve an error, copy the message and paste it in the chat window.
b) Repeat this process untill the issue is fixed.
notes: - If asked to create a database, say “no”.
- If asked for an API Key, use the key found on the “API Key” page.
